# Detailed Implementation Plan: ELEC-005: Perform source localization using dSPM on auditory evoked responses

**Task ID:** ELEC-005
**Category:** Electrophysiology

## Overview

**Objective:** Perform source localization using dSPM on auditory evoked responses

**Context:** Figure out where in the brain the MEG signals are generated by solving the inverse problem

## Data Source

**Dataset:** MNE sample dataset
**Data Key:** `mne.datasets.sample.data_path()`

**Required Capabilities:** mne_source_tool; forward_modeling
